entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
